---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 

OR

00101 - RS2
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 0000000000010000 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 0000000000010000 at index 1 - 001
LI R5 with 0000000000010000 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 0000000000010000 at index 3 - 011
LI R5 with 0000000000010000 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 0000000000010000 at index 5 - 101
LI R5 with 0000000000010000 at index 6 - 110
LI R5 with 0000000000010000 at index 7 - 111

00001 - RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0010000000000000 at index  0 - XXX
LI R1 with 0010000000000000 at index  1 - XXX
LI R1 with 0010000000000000 at index  2 - XXX
LI R1 with 0010000000000000 at index  3 - XXX
LI R1 with 0010000000000000 at index  4 - XXX
LI R1 with 0010000000000000 at index  5 - XXX
LI R1 with 0010000000000000 at index  6 - XXX
LI R1 with 0010000000000000 at index  7 - XXX

 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1100000101001010000100000


program

0001000000000001000000101  
0010000000000001000000101  
0011000000000001000000101  
0100000000000001000000101  
0101000000000001000000101

passes.
